description.mek_x_star.module_space_suit: Turns the meka-suit into a space suit
description.mek_x_star.module_oxygen_tan: Makes your body armor have an oxygen tank to breath from
description.mek_x_star.module_space_suit: Adds insulation to the meka-suit so you don't freeze
description.mek_x_star.module_heat_resis: Makes your meka-suit heat resistive from hot planets
